notes: Recently renovated apartment in excellent condition with modern recessed/cove lighting, light wood-tone flooring, stylish glass-panel sliding doors separating kitchen, and updated bathroom with modern fixtures. The spacious 24-ping layout has an open living/dining area, a separate enclosed kitchen, and at least one bedroom with built-in closet and track lighting. The glass coffee table with sharp edges and the glass kitchen partition doors are minor baby safety concerns, but the flat single-level layout with no stairs is a plus. Windows have security grilles; natural light appears moderate given window sizes. No bedrooms or balcony views are shown, so elevator status is unclear.
